text: Vy, obshchina Mukhammada, luchshaya iz obshchin, kotoruyu Allakh sotvoril dlya pol'zy lyudey: vy povelevayete dobroye, uderzhivayete ot khudogo i iskrenne veruyete v Allakha. A yesli by obladateli Pisaniya uverovali tak zhe iskrenne, kak vy, bylo by eto luchshe dlya nikh. Sredi nikh yest' takiye, kotoryye uverovali, no bol'shaya chast' ikh prestupayet predely very i yeyo ustanovleniya
